content.rendered:
2019 Copa America Hotels & Accommodations

Our 2019 Copa America accommodations have been carefully selected to allow you to get the most out of your experience. We have chosen one of the top hotels in Rio, the iconic Belmond Copacabana Palace, so that our guests can experience both luxurious accommodations and a convenient location in the heart of the city.
